name: transpacific
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
crossing the Pacific Ocean, or relating to countries on both sides of the Pacific Ocean: I was about to embark on a long transpacific flight. Trans-Pacific trade has increased because of the boom in the American economy.
More examplesFewer examplesTraffic on transpacific routes has increased greatly over the last decade.The airline has spent a lot of money on upgrading its trans-Pacific fleet.She was busy making an urgent transpacific phone call.The universities formed a trans-Pacific partnership, sharing professors and students.
